plot outline: The plot revolves around Shekhar (Shiva) from Madurai who is ardent fan of powerstar, the superstar. it depicts the extent to which fans can go in their adulation. Shekhars longtime girlfriend Devi (Naina sarwar) caters to his financial needs.
title: Adra Machan Visilu
plot: The plot revolves around Shekhar (Shiva) from Madurai who is ardent fan of powerstar, the superstar. it depicts the extent to which fans can go in their adulation. Shekhars longtime girlfriend Devi (Naina sarwar) caters to his financial needs.
